name: Athens
culture: Cradle of Western civilization, birthplace of democracy.
food: Famous for souvlaki, moussaka, feta, and Mediterranean cuisine.
history: Ancient city-state, home to the Parthenon and philosophers.
adversity_resilience: Economic crisis recovery in the 2010s.
economy_industry: Tourism, shipping, and services dominate.
environment_geography: Surrounded by mountains and the Aegean Sea.
education_innovation: Historic universities with focus on arts and philosophy.
cooperation_global_ties: Active EU and NATO member.
tourism_attractions: Acropolis, Plaka district, ancient ruins.
population_diversity: Mix of Greeks with growing immigrant communities.
arts_music_scene: Strong theater and music traditions.
sports_recreation: Hosted the first modern Olympic Games in 1896.
famous_people: Socrates, Pericles, Maria Callas.
fun_fact: The city has more theatrical stages than any other city in the world.

name: Oslo
culture: Nordic traditions with modern design and arts.
food: Seafood, salmon, and traditional dishes like rakfisk.
history: Founded around 1000 AD, Viking history.
adversity_resilience: Rebuilt after fires in the 17th century.
economy_industry: Energy (oil), shipping, and technology.
environment_geography: Surrounded by fjords and forests.
education_innovation: Universities with high global rankings.
cooperation_global_ties: Promoter of peace, home of Nobel Peace Prize.
tourism_attractions: Vigeland Park, Oslo Opera House, Viking Ship Museum.
population_diversity: Large immigrant population, especially from Asia.
arts_music_scene: Active jazz, black metal, and contemporary art.
sports_recreation: Winter sports hub, skiing culture.
famous_people: Edvard Munch, Henrik Ibsen.
fun_fact: Oslo hands out the Nobel Peace Prize every year.

name: Helsinki
culture: Blend of Scandinavian and Russian influences.
food: Known for rye bread, fish, and reindeer dishes.
history: Founded in 1550, influenced by Sweden and Russia.
adversity_resilience: Resilience through Winter War and WWII.
economy_industry: IT, design, and shipbuilding.
environment_geography: Located on the Baltic Sea, many islands.
education_innovation: Renowned for world-class education system.
cooperation_global_ties: Member of EU and NATO (since 2023).
tourism_attractions: Suomenlinna Fortress, design district.
population_diversity: Growing immigrant communities.
arts_music_scene: Famous for heavy metal music scene.
sports_recreation: Ice hockey, cross-country skiing.
famous_people: Jean Sibelius, Linus Torvalds.
fun_fact: Helsinki has almost as many saunas as people.

name: Stockholm
culture: Swedish traditions, design, equality-focused society.
food: Famous for meatballs, herring, and fika culture.
history: Founded in the 13th century, important trading hub.
adversity_resilience: Neutral during world wars, economic adaptability.
economy_industry: Tech startups, finance, and design.
environment_geography: Built on 14 islands connected by bridges.
education_innovation: Globally respected universities and research.
cooperation_global_ties: Key EU member, strong humanitarian aid role.
tourism_attractions: Gamla Stan, Royal Palace, ABBA Museum.
population_diversity: Diverse with large immigrant population.
arts_music_scene: Global pop music hub, home of ABBA and Avicii.
sports_recreation: Ice hockey, football, winter sports.
famous_people: Alfred Nobel, Greta Garbo.
fun_fact: Stockholm is often called the 'Venice of the North'.

name: Vancouver
culture: Multicultural city with strong Asian influences.
food: Famous for sushi, seafood, and fusion cuisine.
history: Founded in the 19th century during gold rush.
adversity_resilience: Rebuilt after 1886 Great Fire.
economy_industry: Film industry, tech, shipping.
environment_geography: Surrounded by mountains and Pacific Ocean.
education_innovation: Home to UBC, a top global university.
cooperation_global_ties: Strong trade links with Asia-Pacific.
tourism_attractions: Stanley Park, Grouse Mountain, Granville Island.
population_diversity: Very diverse, over 50% speak a first language other than English.
arts_music_scene: Film, theater, indie music scene.
sports_recreation: Hockey (Canucks), skiing, hiking.
famous_people: Ryan Reynolds, Michael Bubl.
fun_fact: Vancouver consistently ranks among the top 10 most livable cities.

name: Perth
culture: Relaxed lifestyle, strong indigenous culture influence.
food: Seafood, wine, and modern Australian cuisine.
history: Founded in 1829 by British settlers.
adversity_resilience: Adapted to isolation and resource cycles.
economy_industry: Mining, energy, and tourism.
environment_geography: Remote city on the Indian Ocean coast.
education_innovation: Universities in mining and marine sciences.
cooperation_global_ties: Links with Asia and Indian Ocean trade.
tourism_attractions: Kings Park, Swan River, Rottnest Island.
population_diversity: Mix of Australians, British, and Asian immigrants.
arts_music_scene: Growing music and art festivals.
sports_recreation: Cricket, Australian Rules Football.
famous_people: Heath Ledger, Isla Fisher.
fun_fact: Perth is one of the most isolated major cities in the world.

name: Lisbon
culture: Rich maritime traditions and Fado music.
food: Famous for bacalhau, custard tarts (pastis de nata).
history: Major seafaring hub during Age of Exploration.
adversity_resilience: Rebuilt after 1755 earthquake and tsunami.
economy_industry: Tourism, tech startups, and trade.
environment_geography: Hilly city by the Atlantic Ocean.
education_innovation: Historic universities, growing tech scene.
cooperation_global_ties: Strong EU and Lusophone connections.
tourism_attractions: Belem Tower, Jeronimos Monastery, tram rides.
population_diversity: Diverse mix, strong Brazilian and African communities.
arts_music_scene: Fado music recognized by UNESCO.
sports_recreation: Football passion with Benfica and Sporting clubs.
famous_people: Vasco da Gama, Amlia Rodrigues.
fun_fact: Lisbon is older than Rome, founded centuries earlier.

name: Dublin
culture: Rich literary traditions, pub culture.
food: Irish stew, soda bread, Guinness beer.
history: Founded by Vikings, capital since medieval times.
adversity_resilience: Struggled through famine and colonial rule.
economy_industry: Tech hub with major global companies.
environment_geography: Coastal city with River Liffey running through.
education_innovation: Trinity College, innovation in literature and science.
cooperation_global_ties: Strong EU and US links.
tourism_attractions: Guinness Storehouse, Dublin Castle, Temple Bar.
population_diversity: Historically Irish, now multicultural due to immigration.
arts_music_scene: Birthplace of U2, rich folk music tradition.
sports_recreation: Rugby, Gaelic football, hurling.
famous_people: James Joyce, Oscar Wilde, Bono.
fun_fact: Dublin has more pubs per capita than most cities in Europe.
